    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static LookAndFeel create​(boolean dark,
                                 boolean referenceFile)
        Creates the Look&Feel
        Parameters:
        dark - true to apply a dark theme, false otherwise
        referenceFile - true to automatically reference the JS and CSS files in the HTML head tag, false otherwise (the files will be manually addded)
        Returns:
        The Look&Feel
